condition: [AND]([EQ](<*VALUE(CE_Scope_Choices)*>,HW/SW + LABOR),[EQ](<*VALUE(Is Terminal Server Interface in Scope?)*>,Yes))
name: SII_IFCS_Terminal_Svr1
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(SII I/F Configuration Settings-Terminal Svr1:<* Eval((1.5 *  <*VALUE(Number of Terminal Server Devices)*>) + (<*VALUE(Number of Terminal Server Interface Types)*> * 2)) *>)*>
description:
SII I/F Configuration Settings-Terminal Svr1

Calculated Hrs = 1.5*tsd + tst*2
